oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: The Roy Rogers Show - 1945-04-10 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Mutual's The Roy Rogers Show, originally broadcast 1945-04-10, part 2. Featuring Roy Rogers, Pat Friday, Gabby Hayes, Bob Nolan and the Sons Of The Pioneers, Perry Botkin and his Orchestra, and announcer Verne Smith. Sponsored by Goodyear.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Roy Rogers; Gabby Hayes; Bob Nolan; Sons Of The Pioneers; Perry Botkin's Orchestra
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Goodyear Lifeguard commercial -- Pat Friday and Roy Rogers introduce the 'Old Frontier Yarn' -- Dramatized story -- Pat Friday, Gabby Hayes, and Roy Rogers talk -- You Ain't Heard Nothin' Till You Hear Him Roar (Gabby Hayes, Sons Of The Pioneers) -- Closing statement (Roy Rogers) -- Theme (Smiles Are Made Out Of The Sunshine) -- Closing statement (Verne Smith)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Mutual Broadcasting System; Roy Rogers show (Radio program); Goodyear Tire and Rubber Company; Rogers, Roy, 1911-1998; Friday, Pat; Hayes, George, 1885-1969; Nolan, Bob; Sons of the Pioneers; Botkin, Perry, 1907-1973; Smith, Verne
